Title: Because It's Shiny
Description:
While these two were ordering you around, I thought I would do something useful and make sure the gorlocs were not going to surprise us here on the beach.

None of them seemed interested in us, but then I saw one huge gorloc.

It killed off some smaller gorlocs then took off. It had something glowing in its claw though!

It had to be an artifact. And it looked like it was working! We've got to get it back.

By "we" I mean "you." Larger-than-average gorlocs are above my Dragonscale pay grade.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve the artifact from the huge gorloc.
PortraitGiverText: This huge gorloc has killed others of its kind to obtain a glowing and warming titan artifact.
CompletionText: Were you able to get the artifact?
RewardText:
I can hear it humming from here. Ow. It irritates my ears.

Let's see if our two "professionals," Rannan and Tuberros, know what this artifact is.
